FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.description: Easily integrate wallets with developer-friendly settings.

questions.answer_1: T Wallet is a digital wallet based on blockchain technology.
questions.answer_2: Contact customer support to reset your OTP.
questions.question_3: I want to use biometric authentication.
questions.answer_3: You can enable biometric authentication in the app settings.
questions.question_4: I want to connect ABC Wallet to various DApps like OpenSea.
questions.answer_4: To link ABC Wallet, activate DApp connection in the settings menu.
questions.answer_5: NFTs are unique digital assets protected by blockchain technology.
